Wolf_Spider_Armor.help: Your Wolf Spider Armor provides good protection to Smashing, Lethal and Psionic damage types, as well as offering basic levels of protection to most status effects, including Confuse, Fear, Disorient, Hold, Sleep and Immobilize effects.
Wolf_Spider_Armor.shortHelp: Auto: Self +RES(Smash, Lethal, Psionic, Status Effects)

Combat_Training:_Defensive.help: You are more evasive to ranged attacks.

Tactical_Training:_Maneuvers.help: A good leader knows how to protect his team. While active, this power increases the Defense of yourself and all nearby teammates to all attacks. Recharge: Slow
Tactical_Training:_Maneuvers.targetHelp: Your Defense to all attacks is improved due to good teamwork and leadership.

Tactical_Training:_Assault.help: While this power is active, you and your nearby teammates deal more damage and are more resistant to Taunt and Placate.
Tactical_Training:_Assault.targetHelp: Your attack damage is improved due to good leadership and teamwork. You are resistant to Taunt and Placate.
Tactical_Training:_Assault.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} increases your team's damage potential and resistance to Taunt and Placate.
Tactical_Training:_Assault.victimHit: {PlayerSource} increases your team's damage potential and resistance to Taunt and Placate.

Tactical_Training:_Leadership.help: While this power is active, your chance to hit and that of all your nearby teammates' is increased. Your advanced Tactics also protect you and your team from Confuse and Fear effects. Additionally, your Perception is improved, allowing you to better detect Stealthy foes.
Tactical_Training:_Leadership.shortHelp: Toggle: PBAoE, Team +To Hit, Res(Confuse, Fear), +Perception
Tactical_Training:_Leadership.targetHelp: Your chance to hit and Perception is improved due to good teamwork and Leadership. You have moderate protection against Fear and Confuse effects, as well.
Tactical_Training:_Leadership.attackerHit: Your Tactical Training increases your team's chance to hit and Perception.
Tactical_Training:_Leadership.victimHit: {PlayerSource} increases your team's chance to hit and Perception with their Tactical Training.

Mental_Training.help: Your mental training allows you to focus your will, allowing you to move faster than normal, as well as resist slow effects. This power is always on and permanently increases your attack rate and movement speed.
Mental_Training.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} has increased your rate of attack.

Call_Reinforcements.help: As an Arachnos Soldier you have access to a small squadron of Arachnobot Disruptors. Two Disruptors that are one level less than you will show up when summoned. Recharge: Extremely Long
